mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.hotelid AS "hotelid", a.ota_hotelid AS "otaHotelid", a.roomtypename AS "roomtypename", a.roomtypeid AS "roomtypeid", a.ota_roomtypeid AS "otaRoomtypeid", a.ota_roomtypename AS "otaRoomtypename", a.state AS "state", a.bedtype AS "bedtype", a.channelid AS "channelid", a.createby AS "createby", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.updateby AS "updateby", a.updatetime AS "updatetime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roomtype_mapping( hotelid, ota_hotelid, roomtypename, roomtypeid, ota_roomtypeid, ota_roomtypename, state, bedtype, channelid, createby, createtime, updateby, updatetime ) VALUES ( #{hotelid}, #{otaHotelid}, #{roomtypename}, #{roomtypeid}, #{otaRoomtypeid}, #{otaRoomtypename}, #{state}, #{bedtype}, #{channelid}, #{createby}, #{createtime}, #{updateby}, #{updatetime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE roomtype_mapping SET hotelid = #{hotelid}, ota_hotelid = #{otaHotelid}, roomtypename = #{roomtypename}, roomtypeid = #{roomtypeid}, ota_roomtypeid = #{otaRoomtypeid}, ota_roomtypename = #{otaRoomtypename}, state = #{state}, bedtype = #{bedtype}, channelid = #{channelid}, createby = #{createby}, createtime = #{createtime}, updateby = #{updateby}, updatetime = #{updatetime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM roomtype where name=#{name} and hotelid=#{hotelid}
